title: Toxic players and tribunal bans
body:
So I was playing a game today. I picked Trundle to go top and we had a Gankplank who said he will go mid.

There was a guy who had 4th pick and then he picked Zed. He said he will have to go mid and will duo if necessary.

Our GP was kind enough to move to bot lane.

When the game started, I said there is a ban system now and he should not do such stuff. He then said it will be good for his life if he is banned. He then started coming top lane as the creeps spawned. So I went mid instead and he followed me to mid lane.

He followed me for the first 8 minutes. I said in all chat "Report this Zed" and then the enemies realized we are in disharmony. Zed intentionally gave  a kill to the opponent mid laner as soon as he arrived at mid when the opponent mid laner asked him to give him a kill.

After 8 minutes past, he then changed his heart and started goofing around and feeding.

This is not what I expected from ranked games. I would take this if it was normal but this Zed just ruined my gaming experience to the extent that I felt like I will quit this game if the same thing happens again, or at least not play ranked anymore.

And the opponent mid laner flamed me using all sorts of words, siding with Zed, perhaps to create a diversion in our team so that he can win the game. I am wondering if such behaviour is actually being moderated nowadays.

Is there a tribunal system set up in Oceania now?

Because I really to see something done here.

I already reported him but it will do anything to him?
